sentences.en: a complacent attitude towards the problem
sentences.cn: 对问题满不在乎的态度

sentences.en: a dangerously complacent attitude to the increase in unemployment
sentences.cn: 对失业增加抱满不在乎的危险态度

sentences.en: Don't be complacent over occasional success.
sentences.cn: 不要沾沾自喜于一得之功。

sentences.en: He is complacent so much so that he does not know what he is worth.
sentences.cn: 他很自满--自满得忘乎所以.

sentences.en: His book was an eye opener to complacent young men.
sentences.cn: 对自满的年轻人来说,他的这本书有启发作用.

sentences.en: In 1977, to cover every intractable problem with excuses for complacent resignation.
sentences.cn: 而到了1977年, 其目的在于,以彬彬有礼的顺从为理由口实,来掩盖各种难以驾驭的问题.

sentences.en: In this self - complacent conviction she departed.
sentences.cn: 她就怀着这种自我陶醉式的信心走了.

sentences.en: Instead of speaking, I smiled; and not a very complacent or submissive smile either.
sentences.cn: 我没说话, 只是微笑, 而且那也不是非常得意或者谦恭的微笑.

sentences.en: It keeps you ticking over, stops you being complacent.
sentences.cn: 这使你进展缓慢，得意不起来。

sentences.en: It was no longer self - complacent.
She was complacent about her achievements.
sentences.cn: 她对自己的成绩沾沾自喜.

sentences.en: The winner's complacent smile annoyed some people.
sentences.cn: 胜利者 洋洋自得 的微笑使某些人深感厌恶.

sentences.en: There’s a danger of becoming complacent if you win a few games.
sentences.cn: 赢了几场比赛可能就会变得沾沾自喜。

sentences.en: We cannot afford to be complacent about our health.
sentences.cn: 对于健康我们决不能掉以轻心。

sentences.en: We must not become complacent over any success.
sentences.cn: 我们决不能一见成绩就自满自足起来.

sentences.en: We must not become complacent the moment we have some success.
sentences.cn: 我们决不能一见成绩就自满起来.

sentences.en: While most of us feel fairly complacent about the nutrients we're getting from our diets, the facts tell a very different story.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们大多数人对于从饮食中获取的营养成分感到相当满足，实际情况却不是这样。

words.tran_cn: 满足地；自满地；沾沾自喜地

trans.tran_en: pleased with a situation, especially something you have achieved, so that you stop trying to improve or change things – used to show disapproval
